findings.liver: Diffuse echogenicity with smooth contour, no focal liver mass, patent main portal vein with hepatopetal flow, no ascites.
findings.gallbladder: Multiple echogenic gallbladder stones with posterior shadowing and surrounding sludge. Gallbladder is distended with wall thickening, consistent with acute calculus cholecystitis.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.

laboratory_examinations.findings: No polymorphonuclear leukocytes seen. No microorganisms seen.
